name: Bran Van 3000
description: A Canadian alternative rock collective from Montreal, Quebec, founded in 1994 by DJ James Di Salvio and E.P. Bergen.

name: The Avalanches
description: An Australian electronic music group formed in Melbourne in 1997, known for their debut plunderphonics album Since I Left You (2000), as well as their live and recorded DJ sets.

name: Gui Boratto
description: A Brazilian electronic music producer & owner of the record label D.O.C., distributed by Kompakt.
